page.title: 14SMEDLEY'S OF SPALDING (1)
page.content: The factory in Spalding was built in 1931.In 1937 the company started to freeze vegetables instead of canning and now all the vegetables passing through the factory are frozen. The vegetables that are frozen are {Cauliflower,Spinach,Peas,Beans,Carrots {Swede,Turnips and Brussels Sprouts. They also prepare{Coleslaw,Prawn and {Ginger Salad}and various dressings such as{Mayonaise,Vinaigrette,Sweet {and Sour Sauce and Sweet Sauces}for fruit packs. The frozen foods and chilled foods are sold to supermarkets all over the country including{Sainsbury's, Presto, and{Bejam.}Some are even sent abroard. All the produce to be frozen come from farms in this country most of it locally grown.The number of people employed at the factory varies between 140 and 190 according to the season.
